dmca.title: [EV1-C1286149Y] Complaint regarding copyrighted material
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Monday, October 09, 2006 2:25 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1286149Y] Complaint regarding copyrighted material Subject: [EV1-C1286149Y] Complaint regarding copyrighted material ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Complaint regarding copyrighted material Added by system at Monday, Oct 9 2006 06:25 pm X-MailFrom: phil@viptexting.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Oct 9 19:23:12 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 9 Oct 2006 19:21:44 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 09 Oct 2006 19:21:45 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from phil@viptexting.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GX5NQ-0004Zp-KT; Mon, 09 Oct 2006 19:21:44 -0500 Received: from aa.5a.5646.static.theplanet.com ([70.86.90.170] helo=ds1.viptexting.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from phil@viptexting.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GX5NM-000Gls-Q5; Mon, 09 Oct 2006 19:21:40 -0500 Received: from 82-33-65-21.cable.ubr01.trow.blueyonder.co.uk ([82.33.65.21] helo=[127.0.0.1]) by ds1.viptexting.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1GX5NC-0007IJ-3u; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 01:21:32 +0100 Message-ID: <452AE789.1010205@viptexting.com> Disposition-Notification-To: Phil Bayfield VIP Texting LTD Date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 01:21:29 +0100 From: Phil Bayfield VIP Texting LTD Reply-To: phil@viptexting.com Organization: VIP Texting LTD User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.7 (Windows/20060909) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal-response@theplanet.com CC: Ben , Paul Cuckoo Subject: Complaint regarding copyrighted material Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="------------040501020609090307020705" X-PopBeforeSMTPSenders: accounts@viptexting.com,archive@bayfmail.com,phil@bayfmail.com,phil@phil bayfield.com,phil@viptexting.com X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - ds1.viptexting.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - viptexting.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.86.90.170 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of viptexting.com) client-ip=70.86.90.170; envelope-from=phil@viptexting.com; helo=ds1.viptexting.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Oct 2006 00:21:44.0750 (UTC) FILETIME=[1117CCE0:01C6EC02] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear ThePlanet, We would like to notify you of illegal copyrighted material present on a server within your data centre. The offending material is located at: http://www.msolutions.cc/brochures/mCHAT_Case_Studies.pdf The server IP is: 70.85.155.226 The company, txtNation has published falsified quotes apparently made by our company, and has also published our logo and is claiming we are one of their client's, none of this information is true. We have requested that they remove the material and they have ignored our requests, because of this we are now seeking legal action against them, however we would much rather avoid the legal route and were hoping you would be able to do something at your end? I believe as the hosting provider, you do have a certain amount of control if one of your clients are breaking the law? We are also one of your clients and we would greatly appropriate it if you could intervene and request that txtNation remove the material. Thank you in advance for any assistance you can provide, Regards, Phil Bayfield Managing Director VIP Texting Ltd -- *** This is a confidential communication intended only for the named addresses. If you receive this communication in error, please notify us and return and delete it without reading it. This e-mail may not be disclosed, copied or distributed in any form without the obtained permission in writing of VIP Texting Ltd. In any case it may not be altered or otherwise changed. Whilst VIP Texting Ltd believes that the information is correct at the date of the e-mail, no warranty and representation is given to this effect and VIP Texting Ltd can accept no responsibility. *** (multipart/related) MIME element (text/html)

Dear ThePlanet,

We would like to notify you of illegal copyrighted material present on a server within your data centre.

The offending material is located at:

http:// www.msolutions.cc/brochures/mCHAT_Case_Studies.pdf

The server IP is: 70.85.155.226

The company, txtNation has published falsified quotes apparently made by our company, and has also published our logo and is claiming we are one of their client’s, none of this information is true.

We have requested that they remove the material and they have ignored our requests, because of this we are now seeking legal action against them, however we would much rather avoid the legal route and were hoping you would be able to do something at your end?

I believe as the hosting provider, you do have a certain amount of control if one of your clients are breaking the law?

We are also one of your clients and we would greatly appropriate it if you could intervene and request that txtNation remove the material.

Thank you in advance for any assistance you can provide,

Regards,
Phil Bayfield
Managing Director
VIP Texting Ltd
--

*** This is a confidential communication intended only for the named addresses. If you receive this communication in error, please notify us and return and delete it without reading it. This e-mail may not be disclosed, copied or distributed in any form without the obtained permission in writing of VIP Texting Ltd. In any case it may not be altered or otherwise changed. Whilst VIP Texting Ltd believes that the information is correct at the date of the e-mail, no warranty and representation is given to this effect and VIP Texting Ltd can accept no responsibility. ***
